title: Modern elementary mathematics: equations
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Games in mathematics education

description: Animation and simple narration are used to explain the concept of equations. Examples are given to help children understand and correctly use equations to express the equality between numbers. Concludes with a number of true and false number sentences. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
